com.wit.and.widget.adapter.internal.view

Interface IStateView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StateLinearLayout, StateRelativeLayout, StateView

    public interface IStateView

    public interface

    IStateView

    Interface Overview

    Simple interface for state views. This is used for the state views which should handle the custom handling of its states.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handleDefaultStates()

      void setHandleDefaultStates(boolean handle)

      void setOnVisibilityListener(StateView.OnStateViewVisibilityListener listener)

      void setSelected(boolean selected, boolean override)

    • Method Detail

      • setHandleDefaultStates

        void setHandleDefaultStates(boolean handle)

        public void setHandleDefaultStates(boolean handle)

        Sets the boolean flag to indicate if the view should handle default states.

        Parameters:
        handle - If set to true the view will handle default setting of the states otherwise states of this view can be handled only using by overriding methods.

      • handleDefaultStates

        boolean handleDefaultStates()

        public boolean handleDefaultStates()

        Checks if the view handle default states.

        Returns:
        True if the view handle default states otherwise false.

      • setSelected

        void setSelected(boolean selected,
               boolean override)

        public void setSelected(boolean selected, boolean override)

        Overrides handling of the selection mode of the state view.

        Parameters:
        selected - True if the view must be selected otherwise false.
        override -

        void setOnVisibilityListener(StateView.OnStateViewVisibilityListener listener)

        public void setOnVisibilityListener(OnStateViewVisibilityListener listener)

        Registers the callback to be invoked when the state view visibility was changed.

        Parameters:
        listener -
